Name: Ragdoll Madness
About the game: Ragdoll Madness is a physics based game. Complete levels by solving puzzles, Take control of your character with physics-based ragdoll mechanics! Move and Grab the objects and Complete Levels! Create your own levels or mods Unity Engine! You can create Mod or Map using Unity Engine and C#! It depends on your imagination, You can see how to do it in the community section! Split Screen! If you have Keyboard and Gamepad, You can play with friend Split-Screen! and You can Play with Remote Play Together! Keyboard WASD - Movement Arrow Keys - Movement Space - Jump Mouse Buttons (Hold) - Grab Objects Gamepad Joystick - Movement South Button - Jump Left Trigger,Right Trigger - Grab Objects
